content: {"name": "Essex County Department of Citizen Services", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit\" https://hungerfreenj.org/summer-ebt-2024/\nWednesdays by appointment only.  Call (973) 733-2001 to schedule appointment", "email": "", "url": "http://essexcountynj.org/citizen-services/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "320 University Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Central Ward", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07102", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7362717, "longitude": -74.1763825}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 395-8000", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "23:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}]}
